teacher_info.intro: I have been teaching Mandarin Chinese online and face-to-face since 2016. I have taught beginners as well as advanced learners who need to build their professional vocabulary. I develop an individual program for each of my students.

**Please choose Zoom, when you book my class. Thank you!**
Hello!  ^-^
I'm Becky, a Chinese native speaker from the north of China, who is friendly, helpful, smart, humorous and other personalities you will find.
I like travelling to get close to nature and broaden my horizon.
During traveling, I also like to try local food, but my favorite is still Chinese food, haha. 
So if you love to travel as well, we can share our experience about travelling, different food and cultures etc.

I am not in Lyon anymore, but I haven't updated my profile video. 
I was a team interpreter for the national sport team of Taiwan. I’ve worked in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and a trading company (OEM Company). I know the authentic Chinese usage for all sorts of occasions. Ah, and I like singing. I think singing is a very effective way to memorize new words and grammar, and keep you motivated!

我曾經是國家代表隊的隨隊翻譯，也在中華民國外交部跟貿易公司(代工廠)工作過，我知道不同場合的道地中文用語我教簡體跟繁體中文。噢，還有我喜歡唱歌，我覺得唱歌可以幫助學習新的單字和語法，還有保持學習的動力！

Hi,everyone! I'm crystal.I graduated from Beijng Language and Culture University which is the best school in China that teaches Chinese to foreigners.I major in Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages and I have got master degree. I have got professional training.
I am thought to be diligent,optimistic and enthusiastic.I love new things and challenges.I love reading,singing and traveling.I love making friends.In my school life,I took part in many activities and I made a lot of new foreign friends.Although some of my foreign friends have returned home and now are not in China,we are still good friends.

I'm Sonia, I am a kind, patient and encouraging teacher who has the certificate of CTCSOL.
I'm a native speaker, I have a Master degree in Teaching Chinese as Senconed Language.
I've been teaching Chinese for 2 years, including teaching students online for 1 year and teaching in UK for 1 year. My students are from 6 year-old to adult. Whether they want to improve their listening and speaking ability, learn Chinese systematically or want to work and live in China, they all get professional and practical suggestions, and their Chinese level has been greatly improved.

Hello, everyone. I'm Miss Ling Bei from Zhangjiajie, China. As a Chinese, I began to learn Chinese as a child. As my native language, I believe it will be helpful for you to learn Chinese. In addition, I began to learn English in the third grade of primary school, and successfully passed cet-6 in the second grade. Although English is not my native language, I believe it is conducive to Chinese teaching. I have a wide range of interests, affinity and infectious, good at communicating with children, very responsible.大家好，我是玲蓓老师，我来自中国张家界。作为一名中国人，我从小开始学习中文，作为我的母语，我相信一定能对大家学习中文有所帮助。另外我小学三年级就开始学习英文，大二的时候顺利通过了英语六级考试，虽然英文不是我的母语，但相信有利于中文教学。我兴趣广泛，亲和有感染力，善于与孩子沟通，非常有责任心。

Hi, Nǐhǎo, I'm DORA!
native speaker of Chinese, with MASTER DRGREE of Teaching Chinese and a lot of language teaching experiences. 
I can speak ENGLISH, PORTUGUESE and SPANISH. 
I TRAVEL a lot. I lived one year in PORTUGAL one year in SPAIN working as a Chinese teacher. During these days, I traveled to France, Germany, Italy, Russia and many other countries.
I have many teaching experiences and my students are from many different countries with different Chinese levels. I use many game tools in the lessons, such as QUIZLET, KAHOOT.

I'm a Chinese native speaker, I love teaching Mandarin and share different opinions with my students. I have been teaching Chinese for 7 years. I'm quite out-going and patient. After teaching online since May 2020, I've gain quite  a lot o skills in making online class fun and practical.

Native speaker +Pure accent+ Clear pronunciation
Learn Chinese with me and get more pay less!

Since childhood, I was fascinated with traditional Chinese culture and history which I can share this knowledge with my students through daily study in class. I will highlight the key points and save your time, energy and money!

7 years of life experience in North America has helped me to know more about Western culture. If you can speak English or another European language, I will help you to learn more easily by teaching the differences between Chinese and your language. I will help my students reach the goals they have set.

Hi! My name is Hui-Ching, or Jamie! Teaching is what I live to do and I have been teaching Chinese for over 8 years - mostly in higher education. I offer customized courses based on the needs of all language learners, and yes, that includes HSK lessons! All students have different needs so I design my own learning materials for all learners. I believe that joy can be derived from learning, so I want to make the process of learning fun and engaging for you! Connect with me and achieve the goals you have in mandarin Chinese! I look forward to speaking with you!

I am from Harbin in China, with standard Mandarin. My undergraduate, master's, and doctor's degrees are all Chinese language and literature. Now I am a Chinese teacher at university.
大家好，我来自中国哈尔滨，是一名大学对外汉语专业教师，具有10年以上的汉语教学经验。我的汉语普通话标准，发音清楚。我的本科、硕士、博士专业均为中国语言文学。

Hello, everyone. I’m your powerful Chinese teacher, kk. I’m a native Chinese.  And I also got a bachelor of Teaching Chinese to foreigners.  And I’m very kind and patient. It is okay to make mistake. Just relax and enjoy it.

I’ve been teaching Mandarin since 2005. I am professional, passionate, patient, and fun. I specialize in phonetics and linguistics. I can help you with the pronunciation, grammar, listening comprehension, and conversational skills.

Hi, this is Hermione. 
•	13-year teaching experience
•	BA in Teaching Chinese as Foreign Language,
•	Holder of the Qualification Certificate of Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language (Advanced), issued by the Ministry of Education of P.R.China;
•	Skillful in cross-cultural communication with people of different cultural backgrounds

【Sample class on YT:Crystal Chinese】✿7+ years teaching experience✿Full time qualified teacher.With credentials in CTCSOL✿Specialized in polishing pronunciation and grammar✿7年以上教学経験✿CTCSOL(国際漢語教師資格証)を持つ✿発音を磨くこと＆文法マトメが得意✿教日语，中日翻译（曾任职世界五百强日企）

I was born in Russia and later moved to Belarus. I studied and worked in China for 7 years, and have now lived in Japan for three years. I am trying to live a full and diverse life. I like cooking, planting flowers and veggies in my small garden, traveling, going to live concerts, visiting museums and galleries, skiing, and dancing.
My Russian podcast Японамать about modern Japan and my experience here. My Japanese podcast Anya's OiSHii Radio about food. On all platforms.

My name is Zoey. I’m from Sichuan , the hometown of panda. I am a native speaker of Chinese. I can speak Chinese and more importantly, I know how to teach Chinese. I have the Certificate of teaching Chinese to Speakers of other languages. And that’s my major during graduate and undergraduate period. So I got professional training for a few years.

HI，My Name is MuBin,You can call me Miss Mu,  I am a native pressional Chinese teacher from BeiJing. I graduated with master's degree Majoring in TCSL( teaching of of Chinese as a second language) I am a knowledgeable humorous and witty person. im my spare time,I like reading、cooking、watching movies and writing articles. sometimes, I will take the students to travel and taste authentic Chinese food.

I'm a native speaker of Cantonese and Mandarin, who is now living in London. 

Let me accompany you in your learning journey. Can't wait to meet you at our lesson! 

I always feel happy when people are interested in my languages! Please come with me, and have an enjoyable journey!

Achieving goals together in our lessons is the greatest satisfaction I could obtain on this platform.

在人來人往的日常中， 因為緣份, 
我們才得以即使相隔千里，卻仍能相聚。 (網聚)
可以在人海裡擦身而過。成為彼此生命裡的過客，
每一位於我而言都是份得來不易的榮幸。

廣東話對我嚟講係一種連繫。
我好希望同你分享呢種連繫同文化!

I sincerely invite all of you to explore different languages and cultures together!
As long as any of you are interested, I'll be here and more than glad to share it with you!
